titleStmt.title: [A proclamation against breaking or defacing of monumentes of antiquitie, being set vp in churches or other publique places for memory, and not for superstition]
Proclamations. 1560-09-19
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Povvles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation against breaking or defacing monuments of antiquity.
Title from Steele, R. Tudor and Stuart Proclamations, 526. Publication date from STC.
Sheet 1 heading has: "agaynst breakyng"' sheet 2, line 1 of text ends: "charitable".
Imperfect; lacks caption title page and much of second page.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
